com.androidex.ui

类 AutoScrollViewPager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewPager
      • com.androidex.ui.AutoScrollViewPager

  • public class AutoScrollViewPager
extends ViewPager
    Auto Scroll View Pager
      Basic Setting and Usage
    • startAutoScroll() start auto scroll, or startAutoScroll(int) start auto scroll delayed
    • stopAutoScroll() stop auto scroll
    • setInterval(long) set auto scroll time in milliseconds, default is DEFAULT_INTERVAL
      Advanced Settings and Usage
    • setDirection(int) set auto scroll direction
    • setCycle(boolean) set whether automatic cycle when auto scroll reaching the last or first item, default is true
    • setSlideBorderMode(int) set how to process when sliding at the last or first item
    • setStopScrollWhenTouch(boolean) set whether stop auto scroll when touching, default is true
    作者:
    Trinea 2013-12-30

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      static int LEFT 
      static int RIGHT 
      static int SCROLL_WHAT 
      static int SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_CYCLE
      cycle when sliding at the last or first item
      static int SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_NONE
      do nothing when sliding at the last or first item
      static int SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_TO_PARENT
      deliver event to parent when sliding at the last or first item

      • dispatchTouchEvent

        public boolean dispatchTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent ev)
          if stopScrollWhenTouch is true
        • if event is down, stop auto scroll.
        • if event is up, start auto scroll again.

        get auto scroll time in milliseconds, default is DEFAULT_INTERVAL

        get auto scroll direction
        返回:

      • getSlideBorderMode

        public int getSlideBorderMode()
        get how to process when sliding at the last or first item
        返回:
        the slideBorderMode SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_NONE, SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_TO_PARENT, SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_CYCLE, default is SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_NONE
